item.title: WanneShop code error
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

Why do you have;

[code] } else {
return;

    faceNPC(NPCSlot);
		}[/code]

It’s cannot reach the statement case you have the return; (Tbh for what reason do you have the return there)
Anyways, use common sense, remove the return.

[code] } else {
faceNPC(NPCSlot);
}
if (PutNPCCoords == true) {
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
}

		break;[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: WanneShop code error
item.dc:creator: @Ziege_Terra_117 Ziege Terra 117
item.description:
@Ziege_Terra_117 wrote:

Hey guys, I know that the title would make it seem as if I can’t code shops, well I can, but not to this extent, I was experimenting to make it so the player needs 1000 tokkul to enter a shop… this is my code:

} else if (NPCID == 2621) { PutNPCCoords = true; if (playerHasItem(6529, 1000)); deleteItem(6529, 1000); sM("You pursuade Koz to sell you some items"); WanneShop = 15; } else { return;

I have narrowed it down to only 1 error, this is the error:

client.java:13205: unreachable statement faceNPC(NPCSlot); ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Okay, obviously, faceNPC has nothing to do with my code except for the fact that my WanneShop code is two lines above faceNPC.

This is my 2 codes together, how it looks in my client.java:

[code]} else if (NPCID == 2621) {
PutNPCCoords = true;
if (playerHasItem(6529, 1000));
deleteItem(6529, 1000);
sM(“You pursuade Koz to sell you some items”);
WanneShop = 15;
} else {
return;

    faceNPC(NPCSlot);
		}
		if (PutNPCCoords == true) {
			skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
			skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
		}

		break;[/code]

Apologies for the length, but i felt it was relevant to explain it in as much detail as possible, any help at all would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks a lot.
~ Ziege Terra ~

Read full topic
